widget.title: Burstable - Memory/CPU running above request 3-day AVG

timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes'
| ${project_id}
| ${location}
| ${cluster_name}
| ${namespace_name}
| ${top_level_controller_name}
| ${top_level_controller_type}
| filter resource.namespace_name !~ '(kube|istio|gatekeeper|gke|gmp)-system'
| group_by 1m, [value_request_bytes_mean: mean(value.request_bytes)]
| every 1m
| group_by
    [resource.cluster_name, resource.location, resource.project_id,
     resource.namespace_name, metadata.system.top_level_controller_name, metadata.system.top_level_controller_type]
| { all_workloads:
      ident
      | group_by [], [row_count()]
  ; best_effort_workloads:
      filter value_request_bytes_mean_aggregate == 0
      | group_by [], [row_count()] }
| join
| window 5m
| value
    [v_0:
       scale(div(best_effort_workloads.row_count, all_workloads.row_count), '%')]

fetch k8s_container

| ${top_level_controller_type}
| filter resource.namespace_name !~ '(kube|istio|gatekeeper|gke|gmp)-system'

| every 1m
| group_by
    [resource.cluster_name, resource.location, resource.project_id,
     resource.namespace_name, metadata.system.top_level_controller_name]
| { all_workloads:
      ident
      | group_by [], [row_count()]
  ; best_effort_workloads:
      filter value_request_bytes_mean_aggregate == 0
      | group_by [], [row_count()] }
| join
| window 5m
| value
    [v_0:
       scale(div(best_effort_workloads.row_count, all_workloads.row_count), '%')]

text.content: **Reliability Risk**: kubelet can stop your Pods, at any time, and mark them as failed and CPU can be throttled to 0 causing your workloads to become unresponsive.  [Set appropriate resource requests and limits](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/best-practices-for-running-cost-effective-kubernetes-applications-on-gke#set_appropriate_resource_requests_and_limits)

Get started rightsizing your workloads today!

[Right-size your GKE workloads at scale](https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/containers-kubernetes/optimize-gke-workloads-at-scale)

**Red** - Danger of a reliability risk.  
**Yellow** - Warning of a performance risk.

**Red** - Danger of a reliability risk.  
**Yellow** - Warning of a performance risk.

**Performance/Reliability Risk**: Can cause workloads to slow down or become unresponsive and can cause applications to terminate with an out of memory (OOM) error. timeSeriesQuery.timeSeriesQueryLanguage:
{ all_non_besteffort_workloads:
    fetch k8s_container
    | metric 'kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores'
| ${project_id}
| ${location}
| ${cluster_name}
| ${namespace_name}
| ${top_level_controller_name}
| ${top_level_controller_type}
    | filter resource.namespace_name !~ '(kube|istio|gatekeeper|gke|gmp)-system'
    | group_by 5m, [value_request_cores_mean: mean(value.request_cores)]
    | every 5m
    | group_by
        [resource.project_id, resource.location, resource.cluster_name,
         resource.namespace_name,
         metadata.system.top_level_controller_name:
           metadata.system_labels.top_level_controller_name,
         metadata.system.top_level_controller_type:
           metadata.system_labels.top_level_controller_type]
           ,[value_request_cores_mean_aggregate: mean(value_request_cores_mean)]
    | filter value_request_cores_mean_aggregate != 0
    | group_by [], [row_count: row_count()]
; burstable_workload_risk:
    fetch k8s_container
    | metric 'kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_utilization'
| ${project_id}
| ${location}
| ${cluster_name}
| ${namespace_name}
| ${top_level_controller_name}
| ${top_level_controller_type}
    | filter resource.namespace_name !~ '(kube|istio|gatekeeper|gke|gmp)-system'
    | group_by 3d,
        [value_request_utilization_mean: mean(value.request_utilization)]
    | every 5m
    | group_by
        [resource.project_id, resource.location, resource.cluster_name,
         resource.namespace_name,
         metadata.system.top_level_controller_name:
           metadata.system_labels.top_level_controller_name,
         metadata.system.top_level_controller_type:
           metadata.system_labels.top_level_controller_type], [value_request_utilization_mean_aggregate:
       mean(value_request_utilization_mean)]
    | filter value_request_utilization_mean_aggregate > 1 
    | group_by [], [row_count: row_count()]}
| join
| value
[v_0:
       scale(div(burstable_workload_risk.row_count, all_non_besteffort_workloads.row_count),
         '%')]
